Articles.Content: 2 Mbbls of oil and 10k Elite training First World War Surplus equipped soildiers en route.

The 1941 Yankees are immensely indebted to the nation of Velnova. Fox62, you are the type of nation alliances are built on, the type of leader diplomacy is born from.

The 1941 Yankees have achieved total victory over our communist adversaries. Fox, I have returned your troops, your oil, and provided you with $500k for your strong support.

May the strength, success, and valor of the Mainsail Initiative continue onward.

As an aside, I finally picked up Kerbal Space Program a few days ago. It's pretty ****ing sweet.
Hey, helping friends is all what the concept of these alliances is about!

Fellow allies as you can see our individual abilities of our nations to reach out for the stars is slowly growing.

Edit: I have been helping out Lunar Republic (Not part of any alliance) as there nation is under attack by a member of the AU.Asking if the U.S.K could step in ,and provide the Lunar Republic more support in form of air strikes on the opposing side?

Edited July 27, 2013 by MGUARN
Im kerbria and im doing fine, requesting permission to join yo alliance
See if the L.R. is interested in joining us. I'll also contact our leader about Kerbria.
okay doing that right now.

Hey all, I could use some troops. I'll pay $600k for a 10k expeditionary force. It's not an emergency, I just need s'more manpower.

Here's my nation, 1941 Yankees: www.bloc.name/stats.php?id=1478

Contact me if you've got troops to spare.
Lunar Republic wants to join streamline (sorry for late response a bit busy)
Everyone is invited.
i want to join the mainsail initiative I am Zapy97 in BLoc and I rule Zaptonia
Finally found the forums, after a couple days of being in the alliance. Is there an unofficial doctrine members need to follow?
well im not sure ,but i think it is that we we promote peace ,and help out each other ,since it is the kerbal way.

the republic of zambwino( http://www.bloc.name/stats.php?id=8275 )wishes to join the mainsail initiative

Edited August 1, 2013 by bmcloughlin

Zaptonia demands a strong and powerful alliance to make it supreme

PLEASE?!?!?!

I am weak but I wanna be stronger
don't worry the leader is clearly busy with other things ,so be patient.
can I join the mainsail initiative I am just starting and could use some help and I will help if asked my country is called GwacuMaca.
Everyone is in invited, I had family matters
can anyone send me money to grow my gdp, i promise ill pay you back
once your GDP is up at 115 you can buy oil which i heard help increase you growth.Also growth i how you GDP increases overtime.the more the bigger GDP ,or faster your GDP grows if im correct.
This is the United States of Kerbin we are under attack by the African Union.I need a some troops ,and ecomic help please i will pay you later.

Update:jekins of the AU has commented about the war I'm in with there own.

Brozo is set on his war with your member, unfortunately, and it will be his downfall. Deepest apologies from the African Union.

Update:jekins of the AU has commented about the war I'm in with there own.

That's disappointing. The 1941 Yankees will support you in any way possible. I'll send troops and cash ASAP.
can I alliance? i'm duncania

Update:jekins of the AU has commented about the war I'm in with there own.

Velnova is willing to support in all possible ways.
